content: भासः [भास्-भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Brightness, light, lustre. {@--2@} Fancy. {@--3@} A cock. {@--4@} A vulture. {@--5@} A cowshed (गोष्ठ). {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a poet; भासो हासः कविकुलगुरुः कालिदासो विलासः <ls>P. R. 1. 22</ls>; <ls>M. 1.</ls>
भास Mentioned by Bāṇa and Kālidāsa as their predecessor. Flourished before the 7th century.
